text: Bremgarten is a Swiss district in the Canton of Aargau. It has a total of 25 municipalities, listed below: Crest Name of municipality Population (31 December 2004) Area in km² Arni 1,518 3.37 Berikon 4,418 5.38 Bremgarten 6,006 8.02 Büttikon 741 2.82 Dottikon 3,094 3.89 Eggenwil 719 2.46 Fischbach-Göslikon 1,321 3.07 Hägglingen 2,059 7.73 Hermetschwil-Staffeln 1,119 3.34 Hilfikon 233 1.72 Islisberg 495 1.65 Jonen 1,646 5.70 Niederwil 2,269 6.15 Oberlunkhofen 1,661 3.25 Oberwil-Lieli 1,943 5.35 Rudolfstetten-Friedlisberg 3,846 4.90 Sarmenstorf 2,232 8.30 Tägerig 1,261 3.30 Uezwil 373 2.45 Unterlunkhofen 1,251 4.49 Villmergen 5,277 10.22 Widen 3,630 2.62 Wohlen 13,932 12.48 Zufikon 3,639 4.80 Category:Bremgarten District
